price: Dirán: "Cuando estábamos viviendo junto a nuestra familia, teníamos temor,
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبۡلُ فِيٓ أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِقِينَ
footnotes: De caer en lo que desagrada a Dios.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū innā kunnā qablu fī ahlinā mush'fiqīna
